channel.title: Anti-lagg {PI}
channel.description: Can someone give me the Anti-Lagg method.... so my server would stop lagging so much, and be faster pking... because i tested PK (multi Log-In enable) and it is very laggy... when i kill the other of me.. it's take atleast 4-5 second before i could get the drop.

item.title: Anti-lagg {PI}
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Use virtual vm if you want to check for memory leaks (nfs if that’s the right name)

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-lagg {PI}
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

google, i pointed you in the right direction… if there wasn’t guides i’d tell you but there is… plenty of guides…

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-lagg {PI}
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:4, topic:433799”][quote author=Army123 link=topic=536515.msg3922664#msg3922664 date=1329879186]
than how do i make it less laggy?..

EDIT: someone told me there was a anti-lagg method and he expects me to pay for it… wtf
[/quote]
Make sure the code writtten isn’t wasful of cpu/ram. Make sure unneccasairy code is removed safely and have a good structure is optimum circumstances. You probably have a memory leak though if its that bad, check it out.[/quote]

how do i see if my memory is not leaking and is not wasting space?

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-lagg {PI}
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Army123, post:3, topic:433799”]than how do i make it less laggy?..

EDIT: someone told me there was a anti-lagg method and he expects me to pay for it… wtf[/quote]
Make sure the code writtten isn’t wasful of cpu/ram. Make sure unneccasairy code is removed safely and have a good structure is optimum circumstances. You probably have a memory leak though if its that bad, check it out.

Read full topic
